name: Reflection (itch) (TextGuy;)
description:
<Reflection> The Game Intro Its FIRST ever Game Jam Project ,in <Weekly Game Jam 148> with the title of "Mirror",hope you guys could enjoy it , it might be quite difficult if you don't know how the mirror works, but it is totally possible to solve once you find out the theory , If you find it interest you could have a look to my YOUTUBE channel and SUPPORT ME Youtube Channel - TextGuy; Description the game is about a light energy using the power of creating mirrors to help it to reach the goal , the player can create a mirror "Space" , In the mirror world, a shadow appear in the mirror,the shadow are the reflection of you "the light",use your only ability "E" to swap your position with the shadow in the mirror to reach the place where you cant reach,try to avoid your shadow from "Blue Wall" and use the surrounding "Box" to help you achieve your goal. GAME CONTROL W,A,S,D  for Movement. Space for Create Mirror. E to Switch place with the shadow in the Mirror. Q to break the shadow. *Level 5 Bug* this is how the level look like , the walls texture on the left disappear on web mode , Tips

It has 6 Levels , 3 easy and 3 hard.

Level 1 Tip  

Just use your mirror!  "Space" .

Level 2 Tip

Hold it while manage the position,Release it to place the "Mirror" ,it will always place in front of you , once it is placed it will stay at the position until the mirror break , "Q" / "Space" / *Out of Map* ,try to move around.

Level 3 Tip

The "Mirror" last forever until your shadow reached out of map,sometimes it is important where you place the "Mirror".The "Box" is the only interactable object,but sometime it will block you too.

Level 4 Tip

The "Blue Wall " would break your "Mirror" if your "Shadow" touched it , use the surround "Box" to prevent from touching the "Blue Wall",remember to press R if you stuck.

Level 5 Tip  &  Level 6 Tip

This round its all about where you place your "Mirror" ,try to set up your "Box" in the scene to prevent your "Shadow" from the "Blue Wall" after you place your "Mirror".

Good Luck :D do tell me if any of you could pass all levels.  (it's quite difficult)
